trans-unit.source: Specifies the name and mode for a code region.
trans-unit.target: 指定的名称和代码区域的模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A> property specifies whether an instance represents the start or end of the region.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A>属性指定的实例表示的开始或结束的区域。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all compilers support code region directives.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有的编译器支持代码区域指令。

trans-unit.source: To prevent compiler errors, code providers normally do not include code region directives in the provider output for compilers that do not support them.
trans-unit.target: 为避免编译器错误，代码提供程序通常不包括代码区域指令不支持这些选项的编译器的提供程序输出中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective"></xref>类使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, you should also set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A> and <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此构造函数，还应设置<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A>和<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionText%2A>属性。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionText%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective.RegionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective"></xref> class, specifying its mode and name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective"></xref>类，指定其模式和名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the region directive.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域指令的模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the region.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域的名称。
